Bash(cd /home/ash_blanc/src/paper2saas && python3 << 'HEREDOC'
import re

with open('paper2saas.py', 'r') as f:
    content = f.read()

# Pattern to match reasoning=True followed by instructions (for agents without output_schema after)
pattern1 = r'(reasoning=True,\n    reasoning_min_steps=\d+,\n    reasoning_max_steps=\d+,)\n(    instructions=""")'
replacement1 = r'\1\n    stream_intermediate_steps=False,\n\2'

# Pattern to match reasoning=True with Team
pattern2 = r'(reasoning=True,)\n(    instructions=""")'
replacement2 = r'\1\n    stream_intermediate_steps=False,\n\2'

content = re.sub(pattern1, replacement1, content)
content = re.sub(pattern2, replacement2, content)

with open('paper2saas.py', 'w') as f:
    f.write(content)

print("Added stream_intermediate_steps=False to remaining agents/teams")
HEREDOC)

with open('paper2saas.py', 'r') as f:
    lines = f.readlines()

# Find line 146 and insert after it
for i, line in enumerate(lines):
    if i == 145 and 'output_schema=PaperAnalysisOutput' in line:
        lines.insert(i+1, '    stream_intermediate_steps=False,\n')
        break

with open('paper2saas.py', 'w') as f:
    f.writelines(lines)

print("Added parameter to PaperAnalyzer")
HEREDOC)

Bash(cd /home/ash_blanc/src/paper2saas && python3 << 'HEREDOC'
from agno.agent import Agent
import inspect

# Get the Agent.__init__ signature
sig = inspect.signature(Agent.__init__)
params = sig.parameters

# Check stream_intermediate_steps parameter
if 'stream_intermediate_steps' in params:
    param = params['stream_intermediate_steps']
    print(f"stream_intermediate_steps parameter:")
    print(f"  Type annotation: {param.annotation}")
    print(f"  Default value: {param.default}")
else:
    print("stream_intermediate_steps not found in Agent parameters")

# List all parameters
print("\nAll Agent parameters:")
for name, param in params.items():
    if name != 'self':
        print(f"  {name}: {param.annotation}")
HEREDOC)
